title: "Sales Forecast"
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
df = read.csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sergiocast1/markdown-git/master/coffee-flavors.csv')
fig <- plot_ly()
fig <- fig %>% add_trace(
  type='sunburst',
  ids=df$ids,
  labels=df$labels,
  parents=df$parents,
  domain=list(column=1),
  maxdepth=2,
  insidetextorientation='radial'
)
fig
```
